backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing timer session recording, custom presets, goal management, tag tracking, wallpaper upload/fetch via blob storage, and data export functionality with in-memory Map storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three implemented features: transparent UI with full wallpaper visibility, file upload for wallpapers, and functional ambient sound player with audio controls.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including hooks for timers, Spotify, wallpapers, queries, and components for layout, timers, stats, goals, and wallpaper management with transparent styling.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles with OKLCH-based color system defining CSS custom properties for light and dark themes, including variables for backgrounds, foregrounds, borders, and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with Inter and JetBrains Mono font imports from Google Fonts, meta tags, and root div for React application mounting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component managing page routing between Timer and Dashboard, integrating ThemeProvider, FocusMode overlay, keyboard shortcuts, and Toaster notifications.
Full-screen focus mode overlay with transparent backdrop, large timer display, play/pause controls, and exit button using semi-transparent white styling.
frontend/src/components/goals/GoalManage: Dialog component for creating daily study goals with name and target hours inputs, using transparent styling and mutation hook for backend persistence.
frontend/src/components/goals/GoalTracke: Displays study goals with progress bars and achievement indicators, showing a trophy icon and streak count when goals are met. Includes an empty state with a call-to-action to create the first goal and a button to open the GoalManager dialog.
frontend/src/components/help/KeyboardSho: Modal dialog component that displays available keyboard shortcuts (F for Focus Mode, ? for help). Uses a semi-transparent backdrop-blur design consistent with the app's glassmorphism theme.
frontend/src/components/layout/MainLayou: Main application layout wrapper providing navigation between Timer and Dashboard pages, wallpaper background, settings sheet for wallpaper selection, keyboard shortcuts help, and a footer with Caffeine.ai attribution. Includes a top navigation bar with app branding and action buttons.
frontend/src/components/layout/Navigatio: Navigation component with two buttons (Focus and Dashboard) that toggle between main app pages. Applies different styling to indicate the currently active page.
frontend/src/components/presets/PresetMa: Dialog form for creating custom timer presets with fields for name, display label, duration (1-180 minutes), and color theme. Submits data via useSavePreset mutation and shows toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/quotes/Motivatio: Card component displaying a random motivational quote with author and field attribution. Includes a refresh button to cycle through different quotes from the quotes data.
frontend/src/components/sound/AmbientSou: Audio player card for ambient background sounds with a grid of sound selection buttons, play/pause controls, and a volume slider. Uses the useAmbientSound hook to manage playback state.
frontend/src/components/spotify/SpotifyP: Spotify integration component showing current track info with album art, playback controls (play/pause/skip), and login/logout functionality. Displays a connection prompt when not authenticated via the useSpotify hook.
frontend/src/components/stats/StudyStats: Displays study session statistics with charts and filters, showing daily/weekly/monthly/yearly hours, session counts, and a 7-day bar chart. Includes tag filtering and CSV export functionality.
frontend/src/components/tags/TagInput.ts: A reusable tag input component with autocomplete suggestions from existing tags, allowing users to add/remove tags via keyboard or click interactions.
frontend/src/components/timers/Animedoro: Implements an Animedoro timer with alternating study and anime break phases, configurable study duration via slider, and session saving with tags.
frontend/src/components/timers/CustomPre: A countdown timer that uses user-created presets, allowing selection from saved presets and recording sessions with tags upon completion.
frontend/src/components/timers/PomodoroT: A Pomodoro technique timer with configurable work and break durations, alternating between work and break phases, and session saving with tags.
frontend/src/components/timers/Stopwatch: A stopwatch timer that counts up from zero with millisecond precision, allowing users to save elapsed time as study sessions with tags.
frontend/src/components/timers/TimerSect: Main timer section component that provides a tabbed interface for Stopwatch, Pomodoro, Animedoro, and custom preset timers, with buttons for focus mode and preset management.
frontend/src/components/wallpaper/Wallpa: Renders the current wallpaper as a full-screen background with smooth transitions using the useWallpaper hook.
Displays categorized wallpaper thumbnails in a scrollable grid, allowing users to select wallpapers and upload custom ones via WallpaperUploader.
Handles wallpaper uploads from both local files and URLs, with progress tracking and validation, storing custom wallpapers via backend mutations.
frontend/src/data/quotes.ts: Defines a collection of 25 motivational quotes with authors and fields, plus a function to retrieve a random quote.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAmbientSound.ts: Manages ambient sound playback with six predefined sounds (rain, coffee shop, forest, waves, white noise, lofi), handling volume control and localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useAnimedoro.ts: Implements Animedoro timer logic with alternating study and break phases, tracking session data and tags for backend storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useFocusMode.ts: Manages focus mode state with localStorage persistence, providing toggle, enable, and disable functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
Implements global keyboard shortcuts (f for focus mode, ? for help) while ignoring events from input fields.
frontend/src/hooks/usePomodoro.ts: Manages Pomodoro timer state with work/break phases, configurable durations, session tracking, tags, and audio notifications on phase completion.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating timer sessions, presets, goals, tags, and data export/import operations via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpotify.ts: Manages Spotify OAuth authentication and playback control (play, pause, next, previous) with token persistence and current track polling.
frontend/src/hooks/useStopwatch.ts: Implements a stopwatch with start, pause, reset functionality and session data export for time tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useWallpaper.ts: Manages wallpaper selection with predefined and custom wallpapers from backend, persisting user choice to localStorage.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark theme color palettes using aesthetic pastel tones.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders the dashboard page with study statistics and goal tracking components in a centered layout.
frontend/src/pages/TimerPage.tsx: Main timer page component that renders a layout with a motivational quote, timer section, ambient sound player, and Spotify player in a responsive grid.
frontend/src/utils/exportData.ts: Utility functions for converting timer sessions, presets, and goals to CSV/JSON format and downloading them as files, including CSV escaping and blob creation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color schemes using OKLCH, extended typography, container queries, animations (accordion, fade-in), and custom theme tokens for a design system.
project_state.json: Project metadata defining a free aesthetic study website with timer modes (stopwatch, Pomodoro, Animedoro), customizable wallpapers, Spotify integration, and study tracking features with anime/Studio Ghibli themes.
